import './company-add-coupon.css' import history from './../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' export default function CompanyAddCoupon() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { console.log(values) } var today = new Date(); var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0'); var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0! var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy; return ( <>
{({ values }) => (
Title
Description
Price
$
Amount
Date
-
)}
) }
